physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At age 39.9 years: severe short stature (127.4 cm, /H110026.8 SDS), microcephaly (OFC 51.3 cm, /H110023.3 SDS), BMI 20.3 kg/mÂ² (/H110021.0 SDS), acanthosis, clinodactyly, small testes (/H110212 mL), high-pitched voice.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Severe short stature progressively worsened; microcephaly noted. He had poor compliance with testosterone therapy resulting in poor virilization and delayed final adult height until mid-20s.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At age 30 years: severe short stature (137.4 cm, /H110024.0 SDS), microcephaly (head circumference 50.5 cm, /H110022.9 SDS), micrognathia, triangular facies, high-pitched voice, short neck, clinodactyly, and acanthosis nigricans.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive growth failure similar to her brother; persistent hypogonadism with Tanner 1 breast development and abnormal insulin levels noted.
